Package com.nookure.staff.api.extension

Class VanishExtension

java.lang.Object
com.nookure.staff.api.extension.StaffPlayerExtension
com.nookure.staff.api.extension.VanishExtension
public abstract class VanishExtension extends StaffPlayerExtension
This class represents an extension for the vanish feature of the player

  • Method Details

    • enableVanish

      public abstract void enableVanish(boolean silent)
      Enable vanish for the player
      Parameters:
      silent - if true the server will not send a message to the player that this player has left the server

    • disableVanish

      public abstract void disableVanish(boolean silent)
      Disable vanish for the player
      Parameters:
      silent - if true the server will not send a message to the player that this player has joined the server

    • isVanished

      public abstract boolean isVanished()
      Check if the player is vanished
      Returns:
      true if the player is vanished

    • setVanished

      public abstract void setVanished(boolean vanished)
      Set the vanished state of the player
      Parameters:
      vanished - true if the player should be vanished

    • restoreFromDatabase

      public boolean restoreFromDatabase()
      Whether the player state should be restored from the Nookure Staff database
      Returns:
      true if the player state should be restored from the database
